sys_ux_client_script.name: setActiveSidebarTab

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_fa32625cce22021057d04d92ed1aa8be
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">fa32625cdb2202101eeab0806aea03c1</macroponent><name>setActiveSidebarTab</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const { name } = event.payload;
    const { sidebarActiveTab } = api.state;
    if (name != sidebarActiveTab) {
        api.setState("sidebarActiveTab", name);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 17:32:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>fa32625cce22021057d04d92ed1aa8be</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setActiveSidebarTab</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_fa32625cce22021057d04d92ed1aa8be</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 17:32:31</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
